title: Lifes a beach
content:
what font is this ???

thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210704im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/beach_5747.jpg)

 [‹ Help Please. And thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43807 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sharp Creative Typeface - Desperate To Find It Can Anyone Help? :( ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210704/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43738 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hibell

comments.content:
Hi Leigh,

that’s some flavour of Bodoni. The ‘S’ is quite distinctive. [LTC Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906210704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/lanston/ltc-bodoni-175/) is close, but no cigar.  
F

Cheers Florian thats what i thought at first but the E is quite distinctive too.

hummm??

That’s it Tiff!!

BRILLIANT

Thank you for your time!
